name: MONMSG command must be formated    (CL400)
description: This rule searches for CL400 programs containing MONMSG commands without 'MSGID'
output:
This report lists CL400 programs in which MONMSG command is not formated.
It provides the following information:
- CL400 program full name
rationale: The format of messages is very important. More the messages are in good format, easier is for the users to understand them.
remediation:
Ensure that MSGID in the command line as following Sample
MONMSG     MSGID(CPF0864) EXEC(GOTO FIN)

The ID should not be used without MSGID as the following case: 

MONMSG     CPF0864 EXEC(GOTO FIN)
